PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17252012-12-13AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Rum)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (RUM) in order to (1) repeal section B.02.034 of the Regulations to address the issue raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; and (2) make consequential amendments to allow current blending practices to continue.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0292 Publication Date: 2013-01-02
AttachmentsAttachment
